content: एकादश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (शी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Eleventh. {@--2@} Consisting of eleven. {@--3@} Lasting for eleven months. --शी {@--1@} The eleventh day of every fortnight of a lunar month, sacred to Viṣṇu; (when fasting is enjoined and is considered to be productive of great religious merit). {@--2@} Presentations of offerings to deceased ancestors or Pitṛs on the eleventh day after decease. --शं The number eleven.
